name: Confidence Check
text: How confident are you about your preparation for this exam?

name: Time Pressure
text: How much time pressure do you anticipate feeling during this exam?

name: Focus Goal
text: What is one strategy you will use to maintain focus?

name: Perceived Difficulty
text: How difficult did you find this exam?

name: Time Pressure
text: How much time pressure did you feel during this exam?

name: Focus Reflection
text: How would you rate your focus level during the exam?

name: Strategy Reflection
text: What is one exam-taking strategy you will change for the next exam?
